definition: to drive off/to dispel/to expel
to expel/to urge on/to drive/to run quickly
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including
expel the Manchu, revolutionary slogan from around 1900

sentences.english: She tried to drive the evil thoughts out of her mind.
sentences.chinese: 她試圖驅除心中的惡念。

sentences.english: I've got enough will power to get you out of my life for good.
sentences.chinese: 我已經有了足夠的意志力來將你永遠驅除出我的生命。

sentences.english: Mother likes to burn a stick of incense to drive away mosquitoes.
sentences.chinese: 客廳裏點上一支線香驅除蚊蟲。

sentences.english: It is impossible to charm away the whooping-cough.
sentences.chinese: 用符咒驅除百日咳是不可能的。

sentences.english: They can help us to get rid of inhibitions and connect on a deeper emotional level.
sentences.chinese: 它們能使我們驅除壓抑感，獲得更深層次的情感交流。

sentences.english: Therefore, i order to eliminate drowsiness, Shu Qin kept an awl by his side.
sentences.chinese: 蘇秦爲了驅除睡意，便將一把錐子放在身邊。

sentences.english: They are said to be able to ward off evil.
sentences.chinese: 據說戴香布囊可以驅除邪氣呢。
他那一笑驅除了我的恐懼。

sentences.english: Thee darkness of the heart must be done away with knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 心靈中的黑暗必須用罏知識來驅除。

sentences.english: How can we help him to exorcize his terrible thought of suicide?
sentences.chinese: 我們怎樣才能幫他驅除自殺的可怕念頭呢？

sentences.english: She is the Dispenser of boons and the Dispeller of fear.
sentences.chinese: 她是恩惠的施予者和恐懼的驅除者。

sentences.english: It needed to expel the foreign invaders and take control of its destiny.
sentences.chinese: 中國需要驅除韃虜，掌握自己的命運。

sentences.english: Learning to banish boredom is essential for Happiness.
sentences.chinese: 學習如何驅除厭倦感對我們的快樂極其重要。

sentences.english: The dividing up of the land was the only way of banishing them.
sentences.chinese: 土地的區隔是唯一驅除他們的方法。

sentences.english: The darkness within us can't be done away with by swinging a magic sword.
sentences.chinese: 在我們內心的黑暗是不能靠揮舞一把魔劍來驅除的。

sentences.english: To relieve itching, repel flys, mosquitoes and other insects.
sentences.chinese: 止癢，驅除蠅，蚊子和其他昆蟲。

definition: to drive out devils/exorcism
evil spirit/devil
evil influence/unhealthy trend/(a person's) evil air/aura of wickedness/(TCM) pathogenic energy (opposite: 正氣|正气[zheng4 qi4], vital energy)
evil spirits
to start a rebellion/to rise in revolt
to bless and protect/to protect
to drive out devils/to exorcise
neighborly relations
poison gas/toxic gas/manifestation of passion, anger etc (Buddhism)
an order (esp. army)/bugle call expressing military order/verbal command
to purge
realgar wine (traditionally drunk during the Dragon Boat Festival 端午節|端午节[Duan1 wu3 jie2])
to stir up trouble/to invite disaster
to take a tonic or nourishing food to build up one's health
armed enemy of the nation/enemy of the Emperor/fig. championship challenger/contender opposing champion in sporting contest
to disperse/to break up
